page.title: 10HEDGES IN ST.WENN AREA
page.content: When people build the hedges they start with big stones at the bottom and the stones get smaller as they go up. The hedges in{Cornwall}are built like a letter{A}.They have earth in the middle for plants and trees to grow. Grass and weeds would be able to grow quickly from the earth inside the hedge. Where the hedge has been built for a long time you will not see any stones because the plants and trees have covered the hedge.Sometimes cattle rub against hedges and they bring down the earth inside.Then you might be able to see stones in those places. Many of the fields are very small so the area has many lovely hedgerows which are havens for wildlife like plants,creatures and insects.
